casebody.data:
Robert MOSER, Secretary of the Kansas Department of Health and Environment, et al., applicants,
v.
Kail MARIE, et al. No. 14A503. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 12, 2014.

Opinion

Application for stay presented to Justice SOTOMAYOR and by her referred to the Court denied. Order heretofore entered by Justice SOTOMAYOR vacated.

Justice SCALIAand Justice THOMASwould grant the application to stay.
